title: Revenue of Mattel 's Barbie brand worldwide from 2012 to 2019
yAxis: Gross sales in million U.S. dollars
summary: The statistic shows the trend in sales at Revenue Mattel between 2012 and 2019 .
In 2019 , Revenue Mattel generated a sales of around 1159.77 million U.S. dollars .
The spirits company is based in Wolfenbüttel , Germany .
gold: This statistic shows the gross sales of Mattel 's Barbie brand worldwide from 2012 to 2019.
In 2019 , Mattel 's Barbie brand generated gross sales amounting to about 1.16 billion U.S. dollars , up from about 1.09 billion U.S. dollars the year before.
Additional information on Mattel 's Barbie Since the launch of Mattel 's Barbie fashion doll in 1959 , Barbie has become a cultural icon in America and around the world .
